abstract: Ugandan government is charging ringleaders of street demonstrations against rising commodity prices and government corruption with treason, offense that can carry death penalty.
snippet: The government of Uganda is charging the ringleaders of street demonstrations this week with treason, officials said Thursday, an offense that can carry the death penalty.
lead_paragraph: The government of Uganda is charging the ringleaders of street demonstrations this week with treason, officials said Thursday, an offense that can carry the death penalty.

headline.main: Uganda: 2 Leaders of Protest Movement Are Charged With Treason, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Uganda: 2 Leaders of Protest Movement Are Charged With Treason, Police Say
headline.seo: Uganda: 2 Protest Leaders Are Charged With Treason
